data.name: The Forgotten Island - v1.0
data.detailed_description:
This is a very small open world RPG game. Player needs to find various ways to interact in the game. Through battles, you can increase your level and talent points. Try to complete all the tasks to pass three level. Player can farm and fish. Can also eat and drink. Try to find your own way to enjoy the game.

How to play :
◆ Press "W", "A", "S", "D" to walk around.
◆ Hold "E" beside food and bed to recharge vitality.
◆ Hold "E" beside well to recharge stamina.
◆ Press "F" beside a NPC to fight.
◆ Upgrade your level and buy strong equipment.

Fighting rules : (Like rock paper scissors)
◆ Attack include heavy attack and light attack.
◆ Attack can minus enemy's vitality but consume stamina.
◆ Defend can stop enemy's attack without stamina.
◆ Relax can restore stamina but with no defense.
If you are attacked, your recovery will be ineffective.

Heavy attack > Relax
Light attack > Relax
Defend > Attack
Relax > Defend

Talent system:
◆ 1 Strength → 120 Vitality and 50 Stamina.
◆ 1 Agility → 5 Attack and 2 Armor.
◆ 1 Intelligence → 20 Crit, 20 Avoid and 40 Lucky.

P.S.
(1) More missions are included in the Premium version.
(2) Game walkthroughs are uploaded to YouTube and also our website.
(3) The content has been updated to version 1.4

Best Regards,
Thomas

data.short_description: When I opened the ancient scroll, I came to the forgotten island. There are medieval figures and buildings on this island. Some people are merchants and some are villagers. First I want to drink water and eat some food, and then explore the island to find a way back to the real world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: i3-10100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-10400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Do not "sell" privately without permission.
